articles.content: Indians pay four times for a litre of petrol compared to its crude price, which is only around a litre of packaged drinking water. Taxes, commissions and other charges levied on the end-user ensure t… [+4245 chars]

articles.author: K.R.Srivats
articles.title: Budget plan to privatise two PSBs: Centre may have to tweak the ‘nationalisation’ laws - BusinessLine
articles.description: Changes to the two laws that enabled govt to takeover lenders in 1970 and 1980 may be made in the monsoon session
articles.content:
The Centre may have to amend at least two banking laws to take forward its Budget announcement of privatisation of two public sector lenders.
